Class Notification

  • Object
    • ourCloset.Notification
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Comment, Interest

    public abstract class Notification
extends Object
    Author:
    Nishant Sinha

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Notification(int notifierID, int productID)
      Called from the frontend when a user indicates interest in a product or leaves a comment.
      Notification(int notificationID, int notifierID, int productID, java.sql.Timestamp notificationTime)
      Overloaded constructor with notificationTime for database retrievals.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Notification

        public Notification(int notifierID,
                    int productID)
        Called from the frontend when a user indicates interest in a product or leaves a comment.
        Parameters:
        notifierID - The primary key ID of the user who caused this notification.
        productID - The primary key ID of the product this notification corresponds to.

      • Notification

        public Notification(int notificationID,
                    int notifierID,
                    int productID,
                    java.sql.Timestamp notificationTime)
        Overloaded constructor with notificationTime for database retrievals.
        Parameters:
        notificationID - The primary key ID of this notification.
        notifierID - The primary key ID of the user who caused this notification.
        productID - The primary key ID of the product this notification corresponds to.
        notificationTime - The time the action causing this notification (Interest/Comment) occurred.

    • Method Detail

      • getNotificationID

        public int getNotificationID()
        Returns:
        The primary key ID of this notification.

      • getNotificationTime

        public java.sql.Timestamp getNotificationTime()
        Returns:
        Timestamp of when this notification was generated.

      • getNotifierID

        public int getNotifierID()
        Returns:
        The primary key ID of the user who commented or showed interest resulting in this notification.

      • getProductID

        public int getProductID()
        Returns:
        The primary key ID of the product this notification is regarding.

      • getWhenViewed

        public java.sql.Timestamp getWhenViewed()
        Returns:
        Timestamp of when this notification was viewed, returns null if the notification has not yet been viewed.
